languages.text: {n}Вам не раз приходилось {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}расстреливать{/d} поддавшихся скверне солдат, вы знаете, как она проявляется, искажая тело и ум. Этого рабочего можно расстрелять разве что за скудоумие. Он не похож на бесноватого культиста.{/n}

{n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам не раз приходилось {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}расстреливать{/d} поддавшихся скверне солдат, вы знаете, как она проявляется, искажая тело и ум. Этого рабочего можно расстрелять разве что за скудоумие. Он не похож на бесноватого культиста.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself, how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is the absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast schon viele gute Soldaten {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}erschossen{/d}, die sich der Verderbnis hingegeben hatten. Du weißt, wie sie sich manifestiert ... wie sie Körper und Geist befällt. Das einzige Verbrechen, für das es dieser Arbeitet verdient, erschossen zu werden, ist seine fehlende Intelligenz. Er erinnert nicht einmal entfernt an einen verrückten Kultisten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast schon viele gute Soldaten {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}erschossen{/d}, die sich der Verderbnis hingegeben hatten. Du weißt, wie sie sich manifestiert ... wie sie Körper und Geist befällt. Das einzige Verbrechen, für das es dieser Arbeitet verdient, erschossen zu werden, ist seine fehlende Intelligenz. Er erinnert nicht einmal entfernt an einen verrückten Kultisten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}abattu{/d} bon nombre de soldats qui avaient cédé à la corruption. Vous savez comment elle se manifeste, comme elle vient tordre le corps et l'esprit. Mais la seule violation pour laquelle cet ouvrier mériterait d'être fusillé, c'est l'absence totale d'intelligence. Il n'a rien d'un cultiste dérangé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}abattu{/d} bon nombre de soldats qui avaient cédé à la corruption. Vous savez comment elle se manifeste, comme elle vient tordre le corps et l'esprit. Mais la seule violation pour laquelle cet ouvrier mériterait d'être fusillé, c'est l'absence totale d'intelligence. Il n'a rien d'un cultiste dérangé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Has {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ejecutado{/d} a muchos buenos soldados que habían cedido ante la corrupción. Sabes bien cómo se manifiesta, como retuerce la mente y el alma de una persona. Lo único que ha demostrado este trabajador para merecer la muerte es una falta total de inteligencia. No se parece a un cultista enloquecido en nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Has {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ejecutado{/d} a muchos buenos soldados que habían cedido ante la corrupción. Sabes bien cómo se manifiesta, como retuerce la mente y el alma de una persona. Lo único que ha demostrado este trabajador para merecer la muerte es una falta total de inteligencia. No se parece a un cultista enloquecido en nada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは腐敗に屈した兵士たちを数多く{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}射殺{/d}してきた。腐敗がどのように姿を現すのか…それが人間の心身をどのように捻じ曲げるのかを知っている。この労働者を銃殺するに足る唯一の違反事項は、その知性の欠如である。彼は狂ったカルト信者には、これっぽっちも似ていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは腐敗に屈した兵士たちを数多く{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}射殺{/d}してきた。腐敗がどのように姿を現すのか…それが人間の心身をどのように捻じ曲げるのかを知っている。この労働者を銃殺するに足る唯一の違反事項は、その知性の欠如である。彼は狂ったカルト信者には、これっぽっちも似ていない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}枪毙{/d}过许多投靠腐化的士兵，你很清楚腐化是如何表现出来的，也很清楚腐化会如何扭曲一个人的身心。如果这个工人该枪毙的话，那他唯一的罪名就是太蠢了，他一丁点都不像精神失常的邪教成员。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}枪毙{/d}过许多投靠腐化的士兵，你很清楚腐化是如何表现出来的，也很清楚腐化会如何扭曲一个人的身心。如果这个工人该枪毙的话，那他唯一的罪名就是太蠢了，他一丁点都不像精神失常的邪教成员。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yozlaşmanın esiri olmuş nice düzgün askeri {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}vurmuşluğun{/d} var. Yozlaşmanın kendini nasıl gösterdiğini, insanın bedenini ve zihnini nasıl çarpıttığını biliyorsun. Bu işçinin hak ettiği tek ceza, zekâ yoksunluğundan dolayı vurulmak. Aklını kaçırmış bir tarikatçıyla uzaktan yakından alakası yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}shot{/d} a good many soldiers who had given in to corruption. You know how it manifests itself — how it twists a person's body and mind. The only violation that this worker deserves to be shot for is an absence of intelligence. He does not even remotely resemble a crazed cultist.{/n}
